1362 CampaignFleetAPI player = Global.getSector().getPlayerFleet();
1363 CampaignFleetAPI ally = null;
1364 float alliedFP = 0;
1365 for (CampaignFleetAPI curr : context.getBattle().getPlayerSide()) {
1366 if (!curr.isPlayerFleet() && !curr.getFleetData().getMembersListCopy().isEmpty() &&
1367 !curr.isStationMode()) {
1368 if (ally == null) ally = curr;
1369 alliedFP += ally.getFleetPoints();
1370 }
1371 }
1372 float playerFP = 0f;
1373 for (FleetMemberAPI member : members) {
1374 playerFP += member.getFleetPointCost();
1375 }
1376 float damage = 0f;
1377 for (FleetMemberAPI member : resolver.getResult().getLoserResult().getDisabled()) {
1378 damage += member.getFleetPointCost();
1379 }
1380 for (FleetMemberAPI member : resolver.getResult().getLoserResult().getDestroyed()) {
1381 damage += member.getFleetPointCost();
1382 }
1383 float total = playerFP + alliedFP;
1384 if (total < 1) total = 1;
1385 context.setPlayerFPHullDamageToEnemies(context.getPlayerFPHullDamageToEnemies() + damage * playerFP / total);
1386 if (ally != null && alliedFP > 0) {
1387 context.setAllyFPHullDamageToEnemies(context.getAllyFPHullDamageToEnemies() + damage * alliedFP / total);
1388 }
1389 }
1390 backFromEngagement(resolver.getResult());
1391 }
